generalDescription: 3 day trip departing from Sydney to Canberra then back to Sydney. Along this guided tour you will visit various towns and attractions
4 day trip departing Darwin, includes 3 breakfasts, 3 lunches and 2 dinners. Will visit Litchfield National Park, Kakadu National Park and Katherine Hot Springs
3 day trip, experience the outback of Australia visiting the Uluru-Kata-Tjuta cultural centre, learn about the natural and geographical history of the Land. Visit the Uluru-Kata Tjuta National Park.
4 day trip visiting the Tasmanian Wild Dog Creek base camp at Jerusalem National Park. Great opporunities to trek through the Tasmanian alphine wilderness.
3 day trip visiting the Larapinta Trail in Alice Springs. Stay in a semi-permanent camps and enjoy the walks along the Larapinta Trail.
4 day trip from Sydney to Port Stephens. This is a round trip where you will travel via private transport travelling to the Blue Mountains, Hunter Valley and Port Stephens then back down to Sydney.
